name: The Dilapidated
description:
Um, yea. My first project upload. It is pretty boring right now, and there aren't any goals currently, but it looks kind of nice and there are ragdolls. Let me know of any bugs in it that I might be able to fix. A few bugs that I am aware of is you can fly with objects that get picked up with physics, and there is a weird speed glitch and I don't know the cause of it. And last, I am working on a menu because the game is currently menuless. 

 (And if you are wondering about controls, I have a .txt file about those)

*I added a crosshair for accurate grabbing
